reuters.title: FIRST BOSTON INC 3RD QTR SHR 1.15 DLRS VS 76 CTS
reuters.body: Global Motors Inc said it has agreed to become become the exclusive North American importer of the Lincan Gama, a four-wheel-drive sport vehicle manufactured by <P.T. Indauda> of Indonesia. In a letter of intent it signed with P.T. Indauda, Global said it expects to begin marketing the first Lincan Gamas in mid-1989, with 20,000 units projected to be marketed in the first year. Global is the parent company of Yugo America Inc, importer of the Yugoslavian Yugo vehicle. Reuter 
